package.name: sax2
package.summary: sax2: Improved detection/configuration of graphics cards
package.description: Enhanced SaX2 to handle graphics drivers, which have been installed via Novell's "Linux Driver Process". Added detection/configuration of new supported NVidia graphics cards.
